Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Infection/Urinary Tract Infections/Bacteriuria
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urinary Tract Infections/Bacteriuria
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: The presence of bacteria in the urine which is normally bacteria-free. These bacteria are from the URINARY TRACT and are not contaminants of the surrounding tissues. Bacteriuria can be symptomatic or asymptomatic. Significant bacteriuria is an indicator of urinary tract infection.
